Description: This web service returns a list of outstanding patient-entered questionnaires associated with upcoming appointments or series questionnaires due by a certain date. This web service does not return history questionnaires, always available questionnaires, series questionnaires that would be throttled due to existing valid answers, or series questionnaires that are event-based. Reference CarePlan.Search (Questionnaires Due) to define the due date value.

ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR identifier for a CarePlan resource.

CarePlan.Name: CarePlan
CarePlan.Description: An instance of the R4 CarePlan resource.

activity.Name: activity
activity.Description: Actions to occur as part of the care plan.

code.Name: code
code.Description: Detail type of activity. Set to SNOMED 719091000000102.

instantiatesCanonical.Name: instantiatesCanonical
instantiatesCanonical.Description: This contains all the questionnaires associated with the encounter.

scheduledPeriod.Name: scheduledPeriod
scheduledPeriod.Description: Use scheduled.scheduledPeriod to go from today to activity-date.

status.Name: status
status.Description: Set to In-progress, unless all questionnaires are answered. If all questionnaires are answered, set to Completed.

reference.Name: reference
reference.Description: Appointment where questionnaire is to be answered or series questionnaire was assigned.
